subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Justine Henin-Hardenne will finish the year as the top-ranked player in women’s tennis after beating Maria Sharapova, 6-2, 7-5 (5), in the semifinals of the WTA Championships on Saturday.
snippet: Justine Henin-Hardenne will finish the year as the top-ranked player in women’s tennis after beating Maria Sharapova, 6-2, 7-5 (5), in the semifinals of the WTA Championships on Saturday.
